Initializer# init(content:)

iOS 26.0+iPadOS 26.0+Mac Catalyst 26.0+macOS 26.0+visionOS 26.0+

```
@MainActor @preconcurrency
init(@Chart3DContentBuilder content: () -> Content)
```

[`init<Data, C>(Data, content: (Data.Element) -> C)`](/documentation/charts/chart3d/init(_:content:))Creates a 3D chart composed of a series of identifiable marks.[`init<Data, ID, C>(Data, id: KeyPath<Data.Element, ID>, content: (Data.Element) -> C)`](/documentation/charts/chart3d/init(_:id:content:))Creates a 3D chart composed of a series of marks.
